name: Robo.Inc.
description:
Help a mysterious box in the process of reaching theirs unknown destination to the other side of the planet! No man could do this alone so take your alien friends and take this box to the hole!

BUGS:
In  web version in some levels multiple bots are activated at once. Just cycle through them with TAB and all should be ok.

Controls:
WASD - move
R - interact with objects above
F - interact with objects below
TAB - switch robots

ESC - menu
